feed.title: Jiahui (Gabriel) Huang
feed.subtitle:
I'm a 2nd year M.Sc student at the University of British Columnbia [(UBC)](https://www.cs.ubc.ca/) with [Leonid Sigal](https://www.cs.ubc.ca/~lsigal/) as my supervisor, where I work on computer vision and machine learning.
Previously, I received my B.S. at Singapore University of Technology and Design [(SUTD)](https://istd.sutd.edu.sg/) advised by [Gemma Roig](http://www.cvai.cs.uni-frankfurt.de/team.html).
